## Packages

```{r packages, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(infer)
library(broom)
```

```{r packages, include=FALSE}
data <- read.csv("ProspectScreen.csv")
data$Largest.Gift = as.numeric(gsub("\\$", "", data$Largest.Gift))


model1 <- lm(Largest.Gift ~ Enewsletters.Opened + 
               Gifts.Last.2.Years, data = data)
tidy(model1)
```
